entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 7:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning early in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
